CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDO_BS200" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
/*(select first 1 numeroorigem from cpslaudo1 where codigocps = new.codigocps) */
  if (new.descricao = 'AcidoUrico') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'ACIDO URICO' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Ureia') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,1)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'UREIA' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Creatinina') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'CREATININA' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Colesterol') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'COLESTEROL' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Triglicerides') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'TRIGLICERIDES' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'HDL') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'HDL DIRETO' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'TGO') then
  begin
    select first 1  cast(cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(50)) as numeric(15,2) ) as integer ) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'TGO' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'TGP') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(CAST(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2) ) as integer ) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'TGP' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'GGT') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'GGT' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Calcio') then
  begin
    select first 1  Cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2)) from labresultado
    where idatd  = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'CALCIO' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'VLDL') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'VLDL' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'LDL') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'LDL' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if ( (new.descricao = 'Bilirrubina Total') or (new.descricao = 'LTotais') ) then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2))from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'BILI. TOTAL' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if ( (new.descricao = 'Bilirrubina Direta') or (new.descricao = 'BilirrubinaDireta')) then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2))from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'BILI. DIRETA' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Globulina') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'GLOBULINA' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Albumina') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2) ) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'ALBUMINA' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'P_Totais') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2))from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'PROT. TOTAL' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'F.Alcalina') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'F. ALCALINA' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Gama GT') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'GGT' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if ( (new.descricao = 'VDLR') or (new.descricao = 'Acido Lactico') )then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'LACTATO' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if ( new.descricao = 'Glicose') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,1)) as integer) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'GLICOSE' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if ( new.descricao = 'Fosforo') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'FOSFORO UV' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if ( new.descricao = 'CPK') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'CK-NAC' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if ( new.descricao = 'CKMB') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'CKMB' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end


end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDO_CALCIOION" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (new.descricao = 'C.Ionizavel') then
  begin
/*    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'C.Ionizavel' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;*/
    
    
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'C.Ionizavel' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;

  end
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDO_COAGULO" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (new.descricao = 'T.Sangramento') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'TS' and equipamento = 'Coagulograma' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'T.Coagulacao') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'TCoagulacao' and equipamento = 'Coagulograma' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'A.Protrombi') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Ativ.Protombinica' and equipamento = 'Coagulograma' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Tempo') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'SegundosTP' and equipamento = 'Coagulograma' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'RNI') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'RNI' and equipamento = 'Coagulograma' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Coagulo') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'RCoagulo' and equipamento = 'Coagulograma' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'P.Laco') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'P.Laco' and equipamento = 'Coagulograma' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Plaquetas') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'PLAQUETAS' and equipamento = 'Coagulograma' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'TTPA') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'TTPA' and equipamento = 'Coagulograma' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDO_COAGULOGRAMA" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (new.descricao = 'T.Sangramento') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'TS' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'T.Coagulacao') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'TCoagulacao' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if ( (new.descricao = 'A.Protrombi') or (new.descricao = 'AP') )then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Ativ.Protombinica' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if ( (new.descricao = 'Tempo') or (new.descricao = 'TEMPO'))then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'SegundosTP' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'RNI') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'RNI' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Coagulo') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'RCoagulo' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'P.Laco') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'P.Laco' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Plaquetas') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'PLAQUETAS' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'TTPA') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'TTPA' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDO_HEMOGRAMA" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
declare variable valoraux varchar(250);
begin
  if (new.descricao = '1Hemacias') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'RBC' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = '1Hemoglobina') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'HGB' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = '1Hematocrito') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'HCT' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = '1VCM') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'MCV' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = '1HCM') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'MCH' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = '1CHCM') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'MCHC' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = '1RDW') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'RDW_CV' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'GlobalH') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'WBC' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor ;
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as numeric(15,3)) * 1000 as integer);
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Mielo') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Mielocito' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Metam') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Metamielocito' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Basto') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Bastao' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Segme') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Segmentado' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Basof') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Basofilos' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Eosin') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Eosinofilo' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'L.Tip') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'L.tipicos' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'L.Ati') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'L.Atipicos' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Monoc') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Monocito' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'PlaquetasH') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'PLT' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
    new.valor = cast(new.valor as integer) * 1000;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Observacao') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Observacao' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Morfologia') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Morfologia' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;

    valoraux = null;
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Anisocitose' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Anisocitose' || valoraux ;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Hipocromia' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Hipocromia' || valoraux ;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Hipocromia Discreta' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Hipocromia Discreta' || valoraux ;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Microcitose' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Microcitose' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Microcitose Discreta' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Microcitose Discreta' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Macrocitose' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Macrocitose' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Macrocitose Discreta' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Macrocitose Discreta' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Policromasia' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Policromasia' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Policromasia' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Policromasia' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Policromasia Discreta' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Policromasia Discreta' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Poiquilocitose' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Poiquilocitose' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;
    
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Poiquilocitose Discreta' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Poiquilocitose Discreta' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Hemacias em Alvo' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Hemacias em Alvo' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Granulacoes Toxicas' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Granulacoes Toxicas' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;

    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Eritroblastos' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into :valoraux;

    if (( valoraux is not null) and ( valoraux <> '' )) then
       new.valor = new.valor || ' Eritroblastos' || valoraux;
    valoraux = null;
    
  end

end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDO_IMUNOLOGIA" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (new.descricao = 'vDengueIgG') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = (select first 1 numeroorigem from cpslaudo1 where codigocps = new.codigocps) and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'DengueIgG' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'vDengueIgM') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = (select first 1 numeroorigem from cpslaudo1 where codigocps = new.codigocps) and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'DengueIgM' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'vBHCG_Serico') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = (select first 1 numeroorigem from cpslaudo1 where codigocps = new.codigocps) and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'BHCG_Serico' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'vASLO') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = (select first 1 numeroorigem from cpslaudo1 where codigocps = new.codigocps) and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'ASLO' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'vPCR') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = (select first 1 numeroorigem from cpslaudo1 where codigocps = new.codigocps) and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'PCR' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'vF.Reumatoide') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = (select first 1 numeroorigem from cpslaudo1 where codigocps = new.codigocps) and tipoatd IN ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'F.Reumatoide' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDO_INTEGRA" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (new.descricao = 'Sodio') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('SOL','CPS') and resultado = 'Na' order by indice desc into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Potassio') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('SOL','CPS') and resultado = 'K' order by indice desc into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Cloro') then
  begin
    select first 1 cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd IN ('SOL','CPS') and resultado = 'Cl' order by indice desc into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Magnesio') then
  begin
    select first 1 Cast(cast(labresultado.valor as varchar(500)) as numeric(15,2)) from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'MAGNESIO' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDO_SUMARIOURINA" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (new.descricao = 'Densidade') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Densidade' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Cor') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Cor' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'PH') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'PH' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Aspecto') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Aspecto' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Observacao') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Observacao' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Urobilinogenio') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Urobilinogenio' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Proteina') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Proteina' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'C.Cetonico') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'C.Cetonico' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Bilirrubina') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Bilirrubina' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Hemoglobina') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Hemoglobina' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Nitrito') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Nitrito' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Glicose') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Glicose' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Cel.Epiteliais') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Cel.Epiteliais' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Leucocitos') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Leucocitos' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Eritrocitos') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Eritrocitos' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
  if (new.descricao = 'Bacterias') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Bacterias' and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDO_SUMURINA" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
  if ((new.descricao = 'Nitrito') or
      (new.descricao = 'PH') or
      (new.descricao = 'Proteina') or
      (new.descricao = 'Glicose') or
      (new.descricao = 'C.Cetonico') or
      (new.descricao = 'Urobilinogenio') or
      (new.descricao = 'Bilirrubina') or
      (new.descricao = 'Hemoglobina') or
      (new.descricao = 'Densidade') or
      (new.descricao = 'Aspecto') or
      (new.descricao = 'Cor') or
      (new.descricao = 'Eritrocitos') or
      (new.descricao = 'Leucocitos') or
      (new.descricao = 'Cel.Epiteliais') or
      (new.descricao = 'Bacterias') or
      (new.descricao = 'Cil.Granulosos') or
      (new.descricao = 'Cil.Hialinos') or
      (new.descricao = 'Leveduras') or
      (new.descricao = 'Fil.Muco') or
      (new.descricao = 'Observacao'))
      then
  begin
      select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
      where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = new.descricao and equipamento = 'Sumario de Urina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDO_TROPONINA" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (new.descricao = 'Troponina') then
  begin
    select first 1 labresultado.valor from labresultado
    where idatd = new.codigocps and tipoatd in ('CPS','SOL') and resultado = 'Troponina' ORDER BY INDICE DESC into new.valor;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDOVAR_DATAHORA" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 100
as
begin
  if (new.data is not null and new.hora is not null) then
    new.datahora = cast(new.data as date) + cast(new.hora as time);
  else if (new.hora is not null) then
    new.datahora = cast('now' as date) + cast(new.hora as time);
  else 
    new.datahora = cast('now' as timestamp);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_CPSLAUDOVAR_MORFO" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 300
as begin
  if ((new.descricao ='Morfologia') and ((new.valor is null) or (new.valor = ''))) then
    new.valor = 'Hemacias Normociticas e Normocromicas';
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_CPSLAUDOVAR" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('CPSLAUDOVAR',NEW.INDICE,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_CPSLAUDOVAR_DATAHORA" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 100
as
begin
 if (new.datahora is null) then
 begin
  if (new.data is not null and new.hora is not null) then
    new.datahora = cast(new.data as date) + cast(new.hora as time);
  else if (new.hora is not null) then
    new.datahora = cast('now' as date) + cast(new.hora as time);
  else 
    new.datahora = cast('now' as timestamp);
 end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_CPSLAUDOVAR_MORFO" FOR "CPSLAUDOVAR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 300
as begin
  if ((new.descricao ='Morfologia') and ((new.valor is null) or (new.valor = ''))) then
    new.valor = 'Hemacias Normociticas e Normocromicas';
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRIG_DICOM_HEB" FOR "DICOM" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 40
as
BEGIN
  IF (NEW.SOLICITACAO IS NULL) THEN NEW.SOLICITACAO = 'now';
  IF (NEW.PREVISAO IS NULL) THEN NEW.PREVISAO = 'now';
  IF (NEW.DATASINC IS NULL) THEN NEW.DATASINC = 'now';
  IF (NEW.SERVIDOR IS NULL) THEN NEW.SERVIDOR = '\200.17.200.198\DICOM$\';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_DICOM" FOR "DICOM" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('DICOM',NEW.CODIGO,'I') into indice; end
 ^

ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_EVOLUCAOENF_SAPI" FOR "EVOLUCAOENF" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 60
as
begin
  if ((new.tipo = 'U') and (new.historia_admissao is null)) then
  begin
    select  first 1 historico from admissaomedica where codigocps = new.codigocps and historico is not null into new.historia_admissao;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_EVOLUCAOENF" FOR "EVOLUCAOENF" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('EVOLUCAOENF',NEW.EVOLUCAO,'I') into indice; end

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_EVOLUCAOENF" FOR "EVOLUCAOENF" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRIG_BU_EVOLUCAOENF_PEDIDO" FOR "EVOLUCAOENF" 
INACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
as
DECLARE VARIABLE AUX_PEDIDO INTEGER;
DECLARE VARIABLE indicepv3 INTEGER;
DECLARE VARIABLE AUX_ESPECIALIDADE VARCHAR(2);
declare variable codkit integer;
declare variable indiceitem integer;
declare variable descricao varchar(200);
declare variable ccusto integer;
/* code here */
BEGIN
    AUX_PEDIDO = 0;
    ccusto = 0;
    IF ( NEW.IMPRESSO = 'S' ) THEN
    if (exists(select first 1 altaitem.indice from altaitem
                 where alta = new.evolucao and classe = 'Pacotes'  and ( indice_pedido is null or indice_pedido = 0))) then
    BEGIN
         SELECT ESPECIALIDADE FROM CPS1 WHERE CODIGOCPS= NEW.CODIGOCPS INTO :AUX_ESPECIALIDADE;
         IF (AUX_ESPECIALIDADE = '48') THEN
            ccusto = 57;
         else
            ccusto = 56;
        execute statement 'SELECT PEDIDO FROM CRIAPEDIDOESTOQUE(' || NEW.CODIGOCPS || ',' || 0 || ',' || 3 ||',' || 6 || ',' || NEW.USER1 ||' )'
        on external 'localhost:almoxa'
        as user current_user
        password 'ajuda' into :aux_pedido;
         if (aux_pedido > 0) then
         begin
             for select altaitem.indice, altaitem.codigoamb, cast(altaitem.descricao as varchar(200) ) Descricao from altaitem
                 where alta = new.evolucao and classe = 'Pacotes'  and ( indice_pedido is null or indice_pedido = 0)
                 into indiceitem,:codkit, :descricao do
                 begin
                   execute statement 'select indice from CRIAPEDIDOITEMESTOQUE(' || :aux_pedido || ',' ||  :codkit || ',''' || :descricao||''')' on external 'localhost:almoxa' as user current_user password 'ajuda' into :indicepv3;
                   update altaitem set indice_pedido = :indicepv3 where indice = :indiceitem;
                 end
         end
    END
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_EVOLUCAOENF_SAPI" FOR "EVOLUCAOENF" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 60
as
begin
  if ((new.tipo = 'U') and (new.historia_admissao is null)) then
  begin
    select first 1  historico from admissaomedica where codigocps = new.codigocps and historico is not null into new.historia_admissao;
  end
end
 ^

 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_FECHAMENTOABERTURA" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
INACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
as begin
  if ((extract(month from new.data) <> extract(month from cast('now' as timestamp))) or
     (extract(year from new.data)  <> extract(year from cast('now' as timestamp)))) then
     exception exc_proibeabrirfechamento;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_FECHAMENTO" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('FECHAMENTO',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_FECHAMENTO" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRBU_DIF_ARECEBER" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
INACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
declare variable valorrecebido double precision;
BEGIN
        NEW.ARECEBER = NEW.TOTAL - NEW.RECEBIDO;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_FECHAMENTO" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_FECHAMENTO" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
INACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS
BEGIN
  IF ((OLD.DATAPAGMEDICO IS NOT NULL) and (new.USER2 <> 1)) THEN
     EXCEPTION EXC_TRAVA_LOTE_DATAPAGMEDICO;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "LIMPA_FINACEIRO_FECHAMENTO" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 10
as
BEGIN
  IF ( NEW.FINANCEIRO = 0 ) THEN UPDATE FECHAMENTO SET FINANCEIRO = NULL WHERE SEQUENCIA = NEW.SEQUENCIA;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBD_FECHAMENTOABERTURA" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
INACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as begin
  if ((extract(month from old.data) <> extract(month from cast('now' as timestamp))) or
     (extract(year from old.data)  <> extract(year from cast('now' as timestamp)))) then
     exception exc_proibeabrirfechamento;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBD_FECHAMENTO" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
INACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 10
AS
BEGIN
  IF (OLD.DATAPAGMEDICO IS NOT NULL) THEN
     EXCEPTION EXC_TRAVA_LOTE_DATAPAGMEDICO;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL_BD_FECHAMENTO" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 15
as
begin
    UPDATE CPS1 SET FATURAGLOSA =0 WHERE FATURAGLOSA = cast(OLD.SEQUENCIA as integer);
    UPDATE CPS1 SET FATURA =0 WHERE FATURA = OLD.SEQUENCIA;
    UPDATE INTER2 SET FATURAGLOSA =0 WHERE FATURAGLOSA = cast(OLD.SEQUENCIA as integer);
    UPDATE INTER2 SET FATURANO =0 WHERE FATURANO = cast(OLD.SEQUENCIA as integer);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DELFECHAMENTO" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 20
as
begin
  INSERT INTO FECHAMENTOABERTO
  ( SEQUENCIA, CONVENIO, DATA, DATAFINAL, DATAINICIAL, NOTAFISCAL, OBSERVACAO, TOTAL,
    QUANTIDADE, PAGMEDICO, DATAPAGMEDICO, FINANCEIRO, VENCIMENTO,
    RECEBIDO, NOTAFISCALDATA, LOTE, H_IRRF, H_PIS, H_COFINS, H_CLS, H_ISS,
    H_DESCONTO, PARCIAL, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA3, REFERENTE )
   SELECT SEQUENCIA, CONVENIO, DATA, DATAFINAL, DATAINICIAL, NOTAFISCAL, OBSERVACAO, TOTAL,
    QUANTIDADE, PAGMEDICO, DATAPAGMEDICO, FINANCEIRO, VENCIMENTO,
    RECEBIDO, NOTAFISCALDATA, LOTE, H_IRRF, H_PIS, H_COFINS, H_CLS, H_ISS,
    H_DESCONTO, PARCIAL, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA3, REFERENTE
   from FECHAMENTO WHERE SEQUENCIA = OLD.SEQUENCIA;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBD_FECHAMNOTA" FOR "FECHAMENTO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 30
as begin
if (old.notafiscal is not null ) then
  exception excp_notafecham;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRG_BI_TRATAMENTOUNICO" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 5
AS
DECLARE VARIABLE AUX_TRATAMENTO INTEGER;
BEGIN
   AUX_TRATAMENTO =0;
   SELECT TRATAMENTO FROM INTER2 WHERE CODIGOINT = NEW.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = NEW.TRATAMENTO
   INTO :AUX_TRATAMENTO;
   BEGIN
      IF ((AUX_TRATAMENTO IS NOT NULL) AND (AUX_TRATAMENTO > 0) AND (NEW.TRATAMENTO = AUX_TRATAMENTO) ) THEN
        EXCEPTION TRAVAINTER2;
   END
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRIGBI_INTER2GUIA" FOR "INTER2" 
INACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
/* code here */
begin
if (new.tipoguia = '3') then
    new.tipoguia = '+';
if (((new.tipoguia is null) or (new.fatura is null)) or ((new.tipoguia <> '+') and (new.tipoguia <> '1') and (new.tipoguia <> '2'))) then
  exception exc_inter2_guia;
if ((new.tipoguia = '+') and (new.fatura <> 2)) then
  exception exc_inter2_guia;
if (((new.tipoguia = '1') or (new.tipoguia = '2')) and (new.fatura <> 5) and new.fatura <> 1) then
  exception exc_inter2_guia;
if (new.tipoguia is null) then
  exception exc_inter2_guia;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_INTER2VAL" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 0
AS
begin
    Update CPS1 SET VALORTOTAL = VALORTOTAL + NEW.TOTAL
    WHERE CODIGOCPS = NEW.CODIGOINT;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_INTER2" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('INTER2',NEW.INTER2NO,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_INTER2" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_INTER2GUIA" FOR "INTER2" 
INACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
as begin
if (new.tipoguia = '3') then
    new.tipoguia = '+';
if (((new.tipoguia is null) or (new.fatura is null)) or ((new.tipoguia <> '+') and (new.tipoguia <> '1') and (new.tipoguia <> '2'))) then
  exception exc_inter2_guia;
if ((new.tipoguia = '+') and (new.fatura <> 2)) then
  exception exc_inter2_guia;
if (((new.tipoguia = '1') or (new.tipoguia = '2')) and (new.fatura <> 5) and new.fatura <> 1) then
  exception exc_inter2_guia;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "UPD_INTER2VAL" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
begin
  if ( new.TOTAL <> old.TOTAL ) then
     Update CPS1 SET VALORTOTAL = VALORTOTAL - OLD.TOTAL
     + new.TOTAL WHERE CODIGOCPS = OLD.CODIGOINT;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_INTER2" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_INTER2_" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 50
as
begin
   if ((new.a_datafim is not null) and (new.faturano = 0)) then
   begin
     new.diaria = (new.a_datafim - new.a_data);
     if ((extract(hour from new.a_horafim) < 10) and (new.diaria > 0)) then
       new.diaria = new.diaria -1;
   end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL2_INTER2" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
begin
  insert into XX_INTER2
    (CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, CONVENIO, A_VIA, A_DATA, A_HORA, A_DATAFIM, A_HORAFIM,
     A_ENVIO, DOCUMENTOS, A_DATADIA, FATURA, CODIGO, A_VALOR, A_VALOR1,
     A_GLOSA, MARCADO, PARCELA, TIPOGUIA, MOTIVOALTA,FATURANO, OBSERVACAO, ADM,
     ENFERMAGEM, MEDICA, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2, TIPO, MEDICOSOL, CODSERV1,
     CODSERV2, CODSERV3, OBSERVACAO2, DIARIA)
  SELECT
     CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, CONVENIO, A_VIA, A_DATA, A_HORA, A_DATAFIM, A_HORAFIM,
     A_ENVIO, DOCUMENTOS, A_DATADIA, FATURA, CODIGO, A_VALOR, A_VALOR1,
     A_GLOSA, MARCADO, PARCELA, TIPOGUIA, MOTIVOALTA,FATURANO, OBSERVACAO, ADM,
     ENFERMAGEM, MEDICA, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2, TIPO, MEDICOSOL, CODSERV1,
     CODSERV2, CODSERV3, OBSERVACAO2, DIARIA
  FROM INTER2
  WHERE INTER2NO = OLD.INTER2NO;
  DELETE FROM INTER3  WHERE (CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT ) AND (TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO);
  DELETE FROM INTER32 WHERE (CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT ) AND (TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL_INTER2VAL" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
AS
begin
     Update CPS1 SET VALORTOTAL = VALORTOTAL - OLD.TOTAL
     WHERE CODIGOCPS = OLD.CODIGOINT;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL_X_INTER2" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
BEGIN
insert into XXX_INTER2
  (CODIGOINT,TRATAMENTO, CONVENIO, A_VIA, A_DATA, A_HORA,
   A_DATAFIM, A_HORAFIM, A_ENVIO, DOCUMENTOS, A_DATADIA, FATURA,
   CODIGO, A_VALOR, A_GLOSA, A_VALOR1, MARCADO, PARCELA, TIPOGUIA, MOTIVOALTA,
   FATURANO, MEDICA, ENFERMAGEM, ADM, OBSERVACAO, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2, MEDICOSOL, TIPO,CODSERV1,
   CODSERV2,CODSERV3,OBSERVACAO2,  DIARIA, DESCONTO, DATASINC,
   FATURAGLOSA,  A_GUIA,  DATARECEBIMENTO,  IP,  VERSAO,  IP1,  VERSAO1,  DIARIAAUTO,
   DIARIAHORA,  TRAVADIA,  ASSISTAUTO,  TIPOACOMODACAO,  TIPOENFERMARIA,  DATAGLOSA,
   USERGLOSA,  ALTAMEDICO,  ALTAANESTESISTA,  ALTAAUDITOR,  ALTAFARMACIA,  ALTAENFERMAGEM,  TIPOALTATISS,
   TRATAMENTO2)
SELECT
   CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, CONVENIO, A_VIA, A_DATA, A_HORA,
   A_DATAFIM, A_HORAFIM, A_ENVIO, DOCUMENTOS, A_DATADIA, FATURA,
   CODIGO, A_VALOR, A_GLOSA, A_VALOR1, MARCADO, PARCELA, TIPOGUIA, MOTIVOALTA,
   FATURANO, MEDICA, ENFERMAGEM, ADM, OBSERVACAO, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2, MEDICOSOL, TIPO,CODSERV1,
   CODSERV2,CODSERV3,OBSERVACAO2,  DIARIA, DESCONTO, DATASINC,
   FATURAGLOSA,  A_GUIA,  DATARECEBIMENTO,  IP,  VERSAO,  IP1,  VERSAO1,  DIARIAAUTO,
   DIARIAHORA,  TRAVADIA,  ASSISTAUTO,  TIPOACOMODACAO,  TIPOENFERMARIA,  DATAGLOSA,
   USERGLOSA,  ALTAMEDICO,  ALTAANESTESISTA,  ALTAAUDITOR,  ALTAFARMACIA,  ALTAENFERMAGEM,  TIPOALTATISS,
   TRATAMENTO2
FROM INTER2
WHERE INTER2NO = OLD.INTER2NO;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRIG_BD_CHECA_TRAT" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
/* code here */
DECLARE VARIABLE AUXCODIGO INTEGER;
BEGIN
    IF ( ( EXISTS(SELECT FIRST 1 CODIGOINT FROM INTER3 WHERE CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO) ) OR
         ( EXISTS(SELECT FIRST 1 CODIGOINT FROM INTER32 WHERE CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO) ) )THEN
    BEGIN
          EXCEPTION EXC_NAO_DEL_TRAT;
    END
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL_INTER2" FOR "INTER2" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 0
as
begin
  DELETE FROM INTER3  WHERE (CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT ) AND (TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO);
  DELETE FROM INTER32 WHERE (CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT ) AND (TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "GRAU" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
begin
  If ((NEW.CODIGOAMB = '10102019') or (NEW.CODIGOAMB = '00020010')) Then
     NEW.GRAUPARTICIPACAO = 12;
  If ((NEW.CODIGOAMB = '00104020') or (NEW.CODIGOAMB = '00040010')) Then
     NEW.GRAUPARTICIPACAO = 13;
  If ((NEW.CODIGOAMB = '17120041') or (NEW.CODIGOAMB = '17120042') or (NEW.CODIGOAMB = '17120043')or (NEW.CODIGOAMB = '17120044')or (NEW.CODIGOAMB = '17120045')or (NEW.CODIGOAMB = '17120046')) Then
     NEW.GRAUPARTICIPACAO = 6;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.INTER3NO = GEN_ID( GEN_INTER3, 1 );
   NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRBI_INTER3_VALOR_GLOSA_PART" FOR "INTER3" 
INACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 10
as
begin
 if ( NEW.glosa IS NOT NULL ) then
        new.valor = new.valor - new.glosa;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
 declare variable codesp varchar(4);
begin
  if ((new.codesp is null) and ((new.codigoamb = '00020010') or (new.codigoamb = '10102019') or (new.codigoamb starting with '1701'))) then
  begin
    codesp = null;
    select especial from medicos where a_medicos = new.a_medicos into :codesp;
    if (codesp is not null) then
      new.codesp = codesp;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER3TRAVA" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
   EXECUTE PROCEDURE CHECADATAPAGMEDICO(NEW.CODIGOINT,NEW.TRATAMENTO);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_SUS_PROC_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as begin
  if (exists(select convenio from inter2 where codigoint = new.codigoint and tratamento = new.tratamento and convenio in (179,180))) then
  begin
    new.cobrar = 'N';
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER3ANESTESIA" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 30
as
begin
   IF (NEW.DHE = 'N') then
   begin
     if (((new.codigoamb = '17120041') or (new.codigoamb = '17120042') or
        (new.codigoamb = '17120043') or (new.codigoamb = '17120044') or
        (new.codigoamb = '17120045') or (new.codigoamb = '17120046') or
        (new.codigoamb = '17120047') or (new.codigoamb = '17120048') or
        (new.codigoamb = '17120049')) and
        ((cast(new.a_hora as time) >= '19:00') or (cast(new.a_hora as time) <= '07:00') or
        ((extract(weekday from new.a_data) = 6) or (cast(new.a_hora as time) >= '12:00'))
        )) then
     begin
      /* new.dhe = 'S';
       new.valor =2*new.valor;*/
     end
   end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER3_UNVAZIA" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 50
as begin
  if (new.unidadenegocio is null) then
    exception exc_unvazia;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER3_VAZIO" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 50
as begin
  if (new.custo is null) then new.custo = 0;
  if (new.a_filme is null) then new.a_filme = 0;
  if (new.co is null) then new.co = 0;
  if (new.horafinal is null) then new.horafinal = new.a_hora;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "ADICIONA_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 0
AS
begin
    if ( ( NEW.COBRAR = 'S' ) or ( NEW.COBRAR is null)) then
    begin
        Update INTER2 SET A_VALOR = A_VALOR + NEW.VALOR
        Where CODIGOINT = NEW.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = NEW.TRATAMENTO;
        IF ( NEW.COBRAR <> 'N' ) THEN
        BEGIN
            Update CPS1 SET GLOSA = GLOSA + NEW.glosa WHERE CODIGOCPS = NEW.CODIGOINT;
        END
    end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('INTER3',NEW.INTER3NO,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "ATUALIZA_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
    if ( ( OLD.COBRAR <> 'N' ) AND ( OLD.COBRAR <> 'B' ) AND ( OLD.COBRAR <> 'H' ) ) then
    begin
        if ( ( new.Valor <> old.Valor ) or ( new.QUANTIDADE <> old.QUANTIDADE ) or ( new.COBRAR <> old.COBRAR ) ) then
        Update INTER2 SET A_VALOR = A_VALOR - OLD.VALOR
        WHERE CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO;
    end
    if ( ( NEW.COBRAR <> 'N' ) AND ( NEW.COBRAR <> 'B' ) AND ( NEW.COBRAR <> 'H' ) ) then
    begin
        if ( ( new.Valor <> old.Valor ) or ( new.QUANTIDADE <> old.QUANTIDADE ) or ( new.COBRAR <> old.COBRAR ) ) then
        Update INTER2 SET A_VALOR = A_VALOR + NEW.VALOR
        WHERE CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO;
    end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRBU_INTER3_VALOR_GLOSA_PART" FOR "INTER3" 
INACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 10
as
begin
 if ( old.glosa = 0) then
        new.valor = new.valor - new.glosa;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_INTER3TRAVA" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
as
begin
   IF ((OLD.VALOR <> NEW.VALOR) OR (OLD.QUANTIDADE <> NEW.QUANTIDADE) OR
      ((OLD.COBRAR <> NEW.COBRAR) and (new.valor >= 0.01))
      ) then
   EXECUTE PROCEDURE CHECADATAPAGMEDICO(OLD.CODIGOINT, OLD.TRATAMENTO);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_INTER3_GLOSA" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
as
declare variable fatura integer;
begin
  if ((new.glosa <> old.glosa) or (new.representa <> old.representa)) then
  begin
    select faturaglosa from inter2 where codigoint = new.codigoint and tratamento = new.tratamento into :fatura;
    if (fatura > 0) then
      exception exc_glosa;
  end
  NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_INTER3_UNVAZIA" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 50
as begin
  if (new.unidadenegocio is null) then
    exception exc_unvazia;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DELETA2_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
begin
  insert into X_INTER3
     ( CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, A_DATA, A_HORA, CODIGOSERV, A_MEDICOS,
         QUANTIDADE, A_CODMOE, A_QUANTIDADE, CODIGO, VALOR, CODIGOAMB, GLOSA,
         DHE,SENHA, PORTE, CODESP, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2, REPRESENTA, A_FILME,
         CODIGOAMB1, GLOSARECEBIDA, GLOSADATA, GLOSATIPO, DATAINICIO, DATAFIM,
         TIPOCOB, CO, COBRAR, GLOSARESPONSAVEL, GLOSADEFINITIVA, DATASINC,
         UNIDADENEGOCIO, IP, VERSAO, IP1, VERSAO1, RSGLOSA, TECNICA,
         GRAUPARTICIPACAO, HORAFINAL, PACOTE, DATAGLOSA, USERGLOSA, CUSTO,
	 A_SITUACAO, JUSTIFICATIVA)
  SELECT CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, A_DATA, A_HORA, CODIGOSERV, A_MEDICOS,
         QUANTIDADE, A_CODMOE, A_QUANTIDADE, CODIGO, VALOR, CODIGOAMB, GLOSA,
         DHE,SENHA, PORTE, CODESP, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2, REPRESENTA, A_FILME,
         CODIGOAMB1, GLOSARECEBIDA, GLOSADATA, GLOSATIPO, DATAINICIO, DATAFIM,
         TIPOCOB, CO, COBRAR, GLOSARESPONSAVEL, GLOSADEFINITIVA, DATASINC,
	 UNIDADENEGOCIO, IP, VERSAO, IP1, VERSAO1, RSGLOSA, TECNICA,
	 GRAUPARTICIPACAO, HORAFINAL, PACOTE, DATAGLOSA, USERGLOSA, CUSTO,
	 A_SITUACAO, JUSTIFICATIVA
   FROM INTER3
   WHERE INTER3NO = OLD.INTER3NO;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TGBD_INTER3_TRAVA" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as begin
  if (old.user2 in (2)) then
    exception exc_acaobloqueada;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBD_INTER3TRAVA" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 20
as
begin
   EXECUTE PROCEDURE CHECADATAPAGMEDICO(OLD.CODIGOINT,OLD.TRATAMENTO);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DELETA_INTER3" FOR "INTER3" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 0
AS
begin
    if ( ( old.COBRAR <> 'N' ) AND ( old.COBRAR <> 'B' ) AND ( old.COBRAR <> 'H' ) ) then
    begin
       Update INTER2 SET A_VALOR = A_VALOR - OLD.VALOR
       WHERE CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO;
       Update CPS1 SET GLOSA = GLOSA - OLD.GLOSA
       WHERE CODIGOCPS = OLD.CODIGOINT;
    end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_INTER32" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.INTER3NO = GEN_ID( GEN_INTER32, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_INTER32" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER32_COBRAR" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
DECLARE VARIABLE CONVENIO INTEGER;
BEGIN
   CONVENIO = NULL;
   SELECT CONVENIO FROM INTER2 WHERE CODIGOINT = NEW.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = NEW.TRATAMENTO INTO :CONVENIO;
   IF (CONVENIO = 118) THEN
     NEW.COBRAR = 'N';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER32_VALORZERO" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 1
as begin
  if ((new.quantidade <= 0 ) or (new.total <= 0 )) then
    exception exc_valorzero;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER32TRAVA" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
   EXECUTE PROCEDURE CHECADATAPAGMEDICO(NEW.CODIGOINT,NEW.TRATAMENTO);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER32_SAIDA" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as begin
  if (new.saida >0) then
  begin
   if (exists(select saida from inter32 where codigoint = new.codigoint and tratamento = new.tratamento and saida = new.saida)) then
     exception exc_saidadupla;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER32_UN" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as begin
  if (new.unidadenegocio = 2002) then new.a_medicos = 138;
  if (new.unidadenegocio = 2001) then new.a_medicos = 136;
  if (new.unidadenegocio = 1022) then new.a_medicos = 459;
  if (new.unidadenegocio = 2005) then new.a_medicos = 600;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_SUS_PROC_INTER32" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as begin
  if (exists(select convenio from inter2 where codigoint = new.codigoint and tratamento = new.tratamento and convenio in (179,180))) then
  begin
    new.cobrar = 'N';
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER32UNTRAVA" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 50
as begin
 if (new.unidadenegocio is null) then
   exception exc_unidade;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER32_UNVAZIA" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 50
as begin
  if (new.unidadenegocio is null) then
    exception exc_unvazia;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "ADICIONA_INTER32" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 0
AS
begin
    if ( ( NEW.COBRAR <> 'N' ) AND ( NEW.COBRAR <> 'B' ) AND ( NEW.COBRAR <> 'H' ) ) then
    begin
        Update INTER2 SET A_VALOR1 = A_VALOR1 + ( NEW.QUANTIDADE * NEW.VALOR )
        WHERE CODIGOINT = NEW.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = NEW.TRATAMENTO;
        UPDATE CPS1 SET GLOSA = GLOSA + NEW.glosa
        WHERE CODIGOCPS = NEW.CODIGOINT;
    end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_INTER32" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('INTER32',NEW.INTER3NO,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "ATUALIZA_INTER32" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
    if ( ( old.COBRAR <> 'N' ) AND ( old.COBRAR <> 'B' ) AND ( old.COBRAR <> 'H' ) ) then
    begin
        if ( ( new.Valor <> old.Valor ) OR ( new.QUANTIDADE <> old.QUANTIDADE ) or ( new.COBRAR <> old.COBRAR ) ) then
        Update INTER2 SET A_VALOR1 = A_VALOR1 - ( OLD.QUANTIDADE * OLD.VALOR )
        WHERE CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO;
        if ( NEW.GLOSA <> OLD.GLOSA ) then
        Update CPS1 SET GLOSA = GLOSA - OLD.GLOSA
        WHERE CODIGOCPS = OLD.CODIGOINT;
    end
    if ( ( new.COBRAR <> 'N' ) AND ( new.COBRAR <> 'B' ) AND ( new.COBRAR <> 'H' ) ) then
    begin
        if ( ( new.Valor <> old.Valor ) OR ( new.QUANTIDADE <> old.QUANTIDADE ) or ( new.COBRAR <> old.COBRAR ) ) then
        Update INTER2 SET A_VALOR1 = A_VALOR1 + ( new.QUANTIDADE * new.VALOR )
        WHERE CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO;
        if ( NEW.GLOSA <> OLD.GLOSA ) then
        Update CPS1 SET GLOSA = GLOSA + NEW.glosa
        WHERE CODIGOCPS = OLD.CODIGOINT;
    end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_INTER32" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_INTER32_VALORZERO" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 1
as begin
  if ((new.quantidade <= 0 ) or (new.total <= 0 )) then
    exception exc_valorzero;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_INTER32" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_INTER32TRAVA" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
as
begin
   IF ((OLD.VALOR <> NEW.VALOR) OR (OLD.QUANTIDADE <> NEW.QUANTIDADE) OR
      (OLD.COBRAR <> NEW.COBRAR) OR (OLD.UNIDADENEGOCIO <> NEW.UNIDADENEGOCIO)) then
   EXECUTE PROCEDURE CHECADATAPAGMEDICO(OLD.CODIGOINT, OLD.TRATAMENTO);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_INTER32_GLOSA" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
as
declare variable fatura integer;
begin
  if ((new.glosa <> old.glosa) or (new.representa <> old.representa)) then
  begin
    select faturaglosa from inter2 where codigoint = new.codigoint and tratamento = new.tratamento into :fatura;
    if (fatura > 0) then
      exception exc_glosa;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_INTER32_UN" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
as begin
  if (new.unidadenegocio = 2002) then new.a_medicos = 138;
  if (new.unidadenegocio = 2001) then new.a_medicos = 136;
  if (new.unidadenegocio = 1022) then new.a_medicos = 459;
  if (new.unidadenegocio = 2005) then new.a_medicos = 600;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_INTER32_UNVAZIA" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 50
as begin
  if (new.unidadenegocio is null) then
    exception exc_unvazia;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL_X_INTER32" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
BEGIN
insert into X_INTER32
  (CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, A_DATA, A_HORA, CODIGOMM, QUANTIDADE,
   VALOR, CODIGO, GLOSA, USER1, USER2, DATA1,
   DATA2, REPRESENTA, GLOSARECEBIDA, GLOSADATA, GLOSATIPO, A_MEDICOS, CUSTO, GLOSARESPONSAVEL,
   GLOSADEFINITIVA, DATASINC, UNIDADENEGOCIO, COBRAR, IP, VERSAO1,
   RSGLOSA, BRASINDICE, SAIDA, PACOTE, DATAGLOSA,USERGLOSA, REAPRESENTATISS,JUSTIFICATIVA )
SELECT
   CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, A_DATA, A_HORA, CODIGOMM, QUANTIDADE,
   VALOR, CODIGO, GLOSA, USER1, USER2, DATA1,
   DATA2, REPRESENTA, GLOSARECEBIDA, GLOSADATA, GLOSATIPO, A_MEDICOS, CUSTO, GLOSARESPONSAVEL,
   GLOSADEFINITIVA, DATASINC, UNIDADENEGOCIO, COBRAR, IP, VERSAO1, RSGLOSA, BRASINDICE, SAIDA,
   PACOTE, DATAGLOSA,USERGLOSA, REAPRESENTATISS,JUSTIFICATIVA
FROM INTER32
WHERE INTER3NO = OLD.INTER3NO;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBD_INTER32TRAVA" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 20
as
begin
   EXECUTE PROCEDURE CHECADATAPAGMEDICO(OLD.CODIGOINT,OLD.TRATAMENTO);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DELETA_INTER32" FOR "INTER32" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 0
AS
begin
    if ( ( old.COBRAR <> 'N' ) AND ( old.COBRAR <> 'B' ) AND ( old.COBRAR <> 'H' ) ) then
    begin
        Update INTER2 SET A_VALOR1 = A_VALOR1 - ( OLD.QUANTIDADE * OLD.VALOR )
        WHERE CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO;
        Update CPS1 SET GLOSA = GLOSA - OLD.glosa
        WHERE CODIGOCPS = OLD.CODIGOINT;
    end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "OCUPA_LEITO_INTER" FOR "INTER4" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
  IF ( EXISTS (SELECT CODLEITO FROM OCUPLEITO3('NOW', 'N') WHERE CODLEITO = NEW.LEITO) ) THEN
  EXCEPTION LEITOOCUPADO;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_INTER4" FOR "INTER4" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_INTER4" FOR "INTER4" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 10
AS
BEGIN
UPDATE INTER4 SET DATAFIM = NEW.DATA, HORAFIM = NEW.HORA, FOIPARA = NEW.LEITO WHERE CODIGOINT = NEW.CODIGOINT AND (DATAFIM IS NULL);
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_INTER4" FOR "INTER4" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.INTER4NO = GEN_ID( GEN_INTER4, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRBAI_INTER4" FOR "INTER4" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 20
AS
BEGIN
   UPDATE INTER4 SET DATAFIM = NEW.DATA, HORAFIM = NEW.HORA, FOIPARA = NEW.LEITO WHERE CODIGOINT = NEW.CODIGOINT AND (DATAFIM IS NULL) AND (INTER4NO <> NEW.INTER4NO);
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRIG_AI_ATUALIZA_LEITO" FOR "INTER4" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 30
as
DECLARE VARIABLE auxCodigoCPS float;
BEGIN
     for select codigocps from atualiza_leitos
     into :auxCodigoCPS do
     begin
     end
END
 ^

as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('INTER4',NEW.INTER4NO,'I') into indice; end

ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
  IF ( NEW.LEITO <> OLD.LEITO ) THEN
  BEGIN
    IF ( EXISTS ( SELECT CODLEITO FROM OCUPLEITO3('NOW', 'S') WHERE CODLEITO = NEW.LEITO) ) THEN
    EXCEPTION LEITOOCUPADO;
  END
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_SOBCUSTODIA" FOR "INTERVISITA" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 10
AS
declare variable tipo char(1);
BEGIN
   SELECT ORIGEM FROM CPS1 WHERE CODIGOCPS= NEW.CODIGOCPS into :tipo;
   if (:tipo = 'C') then
    EXCEPTION EXC_CUSTODIA;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_LABRESULTADO_DIGITADO" FOR "LABRESULTADO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as begin
  IF ((NEW.EQUIPAMENTO <> 'sysmex') and (NEW.EQUIPAMENTO <> 'smartlyte') and (NEW.EQUIPAMENTO <> 'bs200') and (NEW.EQUIPAMENTO <> 'cardiacreader') ) then
  begin
    new.idatd = new.idresultado;
    new.tipoatd= 'SOL';
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_LABRESULTADO_ASSOC" FOR "LABRESULTADO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 30
as begin
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.idresultado is not null and new.idresultado <> '') and (not new.idresultado containing '-') and (not new.idresultado containing ' ')) then
  begin
    if (exists(select codigocps from cpslaudo1 where codigocps = new.idresultado )) then
    begin
      new.idatd = new.idresultado;
      new.tipoatd = 'SOL';
    end
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_LABRESULT_SYSMEX" FOR "LABRESULTADO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 40
as begin
  if (new.indice = 244966) then
    new.valor = '';
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V1') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'WBC';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V2') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'RBC';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/100 as numeric(15,2));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V3') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'HGB';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V4') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'HCT';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V5') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'MCV';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V6') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'MCH';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V7') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'MCHC';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V8') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'PLT';
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V9') and (new.valor not containing '*' and (new.valor <> ''))) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'LYM%';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V10') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'MXD%';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V11') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'NEUT%';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V12') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'LYM';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V13') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'MXD';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V14') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'NEUT';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
  if ((new.equipamento = 'sysmex') and (new.resultado = 'V15') and (new.valor not containing '*') and (new.valor <> '')) then
  begin
    new.resultado = 'RDW_CV';
    new.valor = cast(cast(new.valor as double precision)/10 as numeric(15,1));
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRIG_BI_LABRESULTADO_ASSOC_BS20" FOR "LABRESULTADO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 45
as
/* code here */
begin
  if ((new.equipamento = 'bs200') and (new.idresultado is not null and new.idresultado <> '' and  (not new.idresultado containing 'A' and not new.idresultado containing 'B' and not new.idresultado containing 'R')  )) then
  begin
    if (exists(select codigocps from cpslaudo1 where codigocps = new.idresultado )) then
    begin
      new.idatd = new.idresultado;
      new.tipoatd = 'SOL';
    end
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAI_LABRESULTADO" FOR "LABRESULTADO" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (new.idlabequipamento is not null) then
      execute statement 'update labequipamento set importado = ''now'' where indice in (' || new.idlabequipamento || ') and importado is null ';
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_LABRESULTADO" FOR "LABRESULTADO" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('LABRESULTADO',NEW.INDICE,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_LAUDOPADRX" FOR "LAUDOPADRX" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (new.indice is null) then
    new.indice = gen_id(gen_laudopadrx,1);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAU_LAUDOPADRX" FOR "LAUDOPADRX" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 20
as begin
 if (new.laudo <> old.laudo) then
 begin
   update laudovar  set laudo = new.laudo where laudo = old.laudo;
   update vinculorx set laudo = new.laudo where laudo = old.laudo;
 end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DELVINCULOPAD" FOR "LAUDOPADRX" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
begin
  DELETE FROM VINCULORX WHERE LAUDO = OLD.LAUDO;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_LOGSAPI" FOR "LOGSAPI" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
BEGIN
  new.datahora     = 'now';
  NEW.INDICE       = extract(year from new.datahora) || extract(month from new.datahora) || extract(day from new.datahora) || gen_id(gen_logsapi,1);
  NEW.IP           = rdb$get_context('SYSTEM', 'CLIENT_ADDRESS');
  NEW.SISTEMA      = rdb$get_context('USER_SESSION', 'SISTEMA');
  NEW.VERSAO       = rdb$get_context('USER_SESSION', 'VERSAO');
  NEW.USUARIO      = rdb$get_context('USER_SESSION', 'USUARIO');
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_LOSAPICAMPO" FOR "LOGSAPI" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as declare variable tamanho integer;
begin
  if (new.campo like '%.0') then
  begin
    tamanho = strlen(new.campo) - 2;
    new.campo = substring(new.campo from 1 for tamanho);
  end
  if (new.campo like '%.00') then
  begin
    tamanho = strlen(new.campo) - 3;
    new.campo = substring(new.campo from 1 for tamanho);
  end
  if (new.campo like '%.000') then
  begin
    tamanho = strlen(new.campo) - 4;
    new.campo = substring(new.campo from 1 for tamanho);
  end
  if (new.campo like '%.0000') then
  begin
    tamanho = strlen(new.campo) - 5;
    new.campo = substring(new.campo from 1 for tamanho);
  end
  if (new.campo like '%.00000') then
  begin
    tamanho = strlen(new.campo) - 6;
    new.campo = substring(new.campo from 1 for tamanho);
  end
  if (new.campo like '%.000000') then
  begin
    tamanho = strlen(new.campo) - 7;
    new.campo = substring(new.campo from 1 for tamanho);
  end
  if (new.campo like '%.0000000') then
  begin
    tamanho = strlen(new.campo) - 8;
    new.campo = substring(new.campo from 1 for tamanho);
  end
  if (new.campo like '%.00000000') then
  begin
    tamanho = strlen(new.campo) - 9;
    new.campo = substring(new.campo from 1 for tamanho);
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_MARCACAO" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
begin
  new.Numero = Gen_ID( Gen_marcacao, 1 );
  if ( new.smsenvia is null) then
      new.smsenvia = 'S';
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_MARCACAO" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_MARCACAO_EMERGHEB" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 50
AS BEGIN
 IF ((NEW.A_MEDICOS IN (3289, 3290)) AND (NEW.PACIENTE <> '')) THEN
 begin
    NEW.HORA3 = 'NOW';
    IF (NEW.OBSERVACAO IS NULL) THEN
       NEW.OBSERVACAO = 'Emergencia';
 end
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_MARCACAO_FILA" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 50
AS BEGIN
 IF (NEW.PACIENTE <> '') THEN
 begin
    NEW.A_MEDICOS2 = NEW.A_MEDICOS;
 end
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_MARCACAO_PACS" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 50
AS BEGIN
 IF ((NEW.A_MEDICOS = 2953) AND (NEW.DICOM IS NULL) AND NEW.PACIENTE <> '') THEN
   NEW.DICOM = GEN_ID(GEN_DICOM,1);
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_MARCACAO" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('MARCACAO',NEW.NUMERO,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_MARCACAO" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
   if ( new.smsenvia is null) then
      new.smsenvia = 'S';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_CHECAR_RESERVA" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
as
declare variable reservar char(1);
declare variable pac varchar(150);
declare variable indice integer;
declare variable codigoamb varchar(10);
begin
   pac = null;
   codigoamb = null;
   reservar = null;
   select first 1 numero, paciente, codigoamb from marcacao where data = NEW.DATA and cast(hora as time) <  cast(NEW.HORA as time) and a_medicos= NEW.A_MEDICOS
   order by hora desc into :indice, :pac, :codigoamb;
   if (codigoamb <> '')  then
     Select first 1 RESERVA from servicos_config where CODPROC =:codigoamb into :reservar;
   if (reservar = 'S')  then
   begin
       exception EXC_CHECAR_RESERVA;
   end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_MARCACAO_RESERVAR" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
as
declare variable checar char(1);
declare variable pac varchar(150);
declare variable indice integer;
begin
   Select first 1 RESERVA from servicos_config where CODPROC = new.codigoamb into :checar;
   pac = null;
   if (checar = 'S')  then
   begin
        select first 1 numero, paciente from marcacao where data = NEW.DATA and cast(hora as time) > NEW.HORA and a_medicos= NEW.A_MEDICOS order by hora desc into :indice, :pac;
        If ((pac <> null) OR (pac <> '')) then
        begin
            exception EXC_RESERVAR;
        end
        Else if (:indice > 0) Then
           update marcacao set paciente = 'Horrio Reservado' where numero= :indice;
   end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_MARCACAO_PACS" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 50
AS BEGIN
 IF ((NEW.A_MEDICOS = 2953) AND (NEW.DICOM IS NULL) AND NEW.PACIENTE <> '') THEN
   NEW.DICOM = GEN_ID(GEN_DICOM,1);
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_MARCACAO_SIMULT" FOR "MARCACAO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 120
as begin
  if (old.paciente <> new.paciente) then
  if ((old.datasinc - new.datasinc) <= 0.000034722) then
  begin
    exception excuniinter;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_MATMED_SIMPRO_TUSS" FOR "MATMED" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN
 IF ((NEW.SIMPRO > 0 ) AND (NEW.TUSSBRAS IS NULL)) THEN
   SELECT FIRST 1 CODIGO_TUSS FROM SIMPRO_LAYOUT2 WHERE CODIGO_USUARIO = NEW.SIMPRO INTO NEW.TUSSBRAS;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_MATMEDCONV" FOR "MATMEDCONV" 
INACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
as begin
  if ((new.convenio = 164) and (new.codtiss <> '')) then
  begin
    new.a_codamb = cast(new.codtiss as integer);
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "XDELETA_MATMEDCONV" FOR "MATMEDCONV" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
BEGIN
insert into X_MATMEDCONV
  (CODIGOMM,CONVENIO,VALOR,CODIGOCONV,INDICE,DATA2,BLOQUEADO,QTDE,INTERVALO,DATASINC,CODTISS,OBS,A_CODAMB)
SELECT
  CODIGOMM,CONVENIO,VALOR,CODIGOCONV,INDICE,DATA2,BLOQUEADO,QTDE,INTERVALO,DATASINC,CODTISS,OBS,A_CODAMB
FROM MATMEDCONV
WHERE INDICE = OLD.INDICE;
END
 ^

 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_MATMEDP_PFB" FOR "MATMEDP" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
declare variable precoaux double precision;
begin
  precoaux = null;
  if (new.PRECOPFB is null) then
  begin
    select first 1 precopfb from matmedp where codigomm = new.codigomm and precopfb > 0 order by data desc, indice desc into precoaux;
    if (:precoaux > 0 ) then
      new.precopfb = precoaux;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_MATMEDP" FOR "MATMEDP" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('MATMEDP',NEW.INDICE,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_MATMEDP" FOR "MATMEDP" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_MATMEDP" FOR "MATMEDP" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL_MATMEDP" FOR "MATMEDP" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
BEGIN
execute statement 'insert into xmatmedp (data, brasindice, indice, codigomm, preco, codigo, data2, datasinc, codimport,
  user1, user2, data1, ip, versao, ip1, versao1, precopfb, precopmc )
SELECT
   data, brasindice, indice, codigomm, preco, codigo, data2, datasinc, codimport,
  user1, user2, data1, ip, versao, ip1, versao1, precopfb, precopmc
FROM matmedp
WHERE INDICE = ' || cast(OLD.INDICE as integer);
END
 ^

ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END

    NEW.A_NOTAMED = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "NOTAMED_HORAINICIO" FOR "NOTAMED" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   IF (NEW.HORAINICIO IS NULL) THEN
   Begin
       NEW.HORAINICIO = 8;
   End
END
 ^

ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_NOTAMED_TIPO" FOR "NOTAMED" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 40
as
begin
  new.tipo = rdb$get_context('USER_SESSION','TIPOPRESC');
end
 ^
