 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAULOG_NOTAMED" FOR "NOTAMED" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED',NEW.A_NOTAMED,'U') into :indice;
if ((new.APRAZADA <> old.APRAZADA) or (new.APRAZADA is null and old.APRAZADA is not null) or (new.APRAZADA is not null and old.APRAZADA is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'APRAZADA',old.APRAZADA,new.APRAZADA);
if ((new.A_CODIGO1 <> old.A_CODIGO1) or (new.A_CODIGO1 is null and old.A_CODIGO1 is not null) or (new.A_CODIGO1 is not null and old.A_CODIGO1 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_CODIGO1',old.A_CODIGO1,new.A_CODIGO1);
if ((new.A_MEDICOS <> old.A_MEDICOS) or (new.A_MEDICOS is null and old.A_MEDICOS is not null) or (new.A_MEDICOS is not null and old.A_MEDICOS is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_MEDICOS',old.A_MEDICOS,new.A_MEDICOS);
if ((new.A_NOTAMED <> old.A_NOTAMED) or (new.A_NOTAMED is null and old.A_NOTAMED is not null) or (new.A_NOTAMED is not null and old.A_NOTAMED is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_NOTAMED',old.A_NOTAMED,new.A_NOTAMED);
if ((new.CODIGO <> old.CODIGO) or (new.CODIGO is null and old.CODIGO is not null) or (new.CODIGO is not null and old.CODIGO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CODIGO',old.CODIGO,new.CODIGO);
if ((new.CODIGOCPS <> old.CODIGOCPS) or (new.CODIGOCPS is null and old.CODIGOCPS is not null) or (new.CODIGOCPS is not null and old.CODIGOCPS is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CODIGOCPS',old.CODIGOCPS,new.CODIGOCPS);
if ((new.CONTEUDO <> old.CONTEUDO) or (new.CONTEUDO is null and old.CONTEUDO is not null) or (new.CONTEUDO is not null and old.CONTEUDO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CONTEUDO',old.CONTEUDO,new.CONTEUDO);
if ((new.CONTINUACAO <> old.CONTINUACAO) or (new.CONTINUACAO is null and old.CONTINUACAO is not null) or (new.CONTINUACAO is not null and old.CONTINUACAO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CONTINUACAO',old.CONTINUACAO,new.CONTINUACAO);
if ((new.DATAHORA <> old.DATAHORA) or (new.DATAHORA is null and old.DATAHORA is not null) or (new.DATAHORA is not null and old.DATAHORA is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DATAHORA',old.DATAHORA,new.DATAHORA);
if ((new.DATAHORAVALIDADE <> old.DATAHORAVALIDADE) or (new.DATAHORAVALIDADE is null and old.DATAHORAVALIDADE is not null) or (new.DATAHORAVALIDADE is not null and old.DATAHORAVALIDADE is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DATAHORAVALIDADE',old.DATAHORAVALIDADE,new.DATAHORAVALIDADE);
if ((new.DISPENSADOR <> old.DISPENSADOR) or (new.DISPENSADOR is null and old.DISPENSADOR is not null) or (new.DISPENSADOR is not null and old.DISPENSADOR is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DISPENSADOR',old.DISPENSADOR,new.DISPENSADOR);
if ((new.EVOLUCAO <> old.EVOLUCAO) or (new.EVOLUCAO is null and old.EVOLUCAO is not null) or (new.EVOLUCAO is not null and old.EVOLUCAO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'EVOLUCAO',old.EVOLUCAO,new.EVOLUCAO);
if ((new.HORAINICIO <> old.HORAINICIO) or (new.HORAINICIO is null and old.HORAINICIO is not null) or (new.HORAINICIO is not null and old.HORAINICIO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'HORAINICIO',old.HORAINICIO,new.HORAINICIO);
if ((new.IMPRESSAODISPENSA <> old.IMPRESSAODISPENSA) or (new.IMPRESSAODISPENSA is null and old.IMPRESSAODISPENSA is not null) or (new.IMPRESSAODISPENSA is not null and old.IMPRESSAODISPENSA is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'IMPRESSAODISPENSA',old.IMPRESSAODISPENSA,new.IMPRESSAODISPENSA);
if ((new.IMPRESSO <> old.IMPRESSO) or (new.IMPRESSO is null and old.IMPRESSO is not null) or (new.IMPRESSO is not null and old.IMPRESSO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'IMPRESSO',old.IMPRESSO,new.IMPRESSO);
if ((new.INTERCOR <> old.INTERCOR) or (new.INTERCOR is null and old.INTERCOR is not null) or (new.INTERCOR is not null and old.INTERCOR is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'INTERCOR',old.INTERCOR,new.INTERCOR);
if ((new.ISOLAMENTO <> old.ISOLAMENTO) or (new.ISOLAMENTO is null and old.ISOLAMENTO is not null) or (new.ISOLAMENTO is not null and old.ISOLAMENTO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'ISOLAMENTO',old.ISOLAMENTO,new.ISOLAMENTO);
if ((new.MODELO <> old.MODELO) or (new.MODELO is null and old.MODELO is not null) or (new.MODELO is not null and old.MODELO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'MODELO',old.MODELO,new.MODELO);
if ((new.REPOUSO <> old.REPOUSO) or (new.REPOUSO is null and old.REPOUSO is not null) or (new.REPOUSO is not null and old.REPOUSO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'REPOUSO',old.REPOUSO,new.REPOUSO);
if ((new.TRATAMENTO <> old.TRATAMENTO) or (new.TRATAMENTO is null and old.TRATAMENTO is not null) or (new.TRATAMENTO is not null and old.TRATAMENTO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'TRATAMENTO',old.TRATAMENTO,new.TRATAMENTO);
if ((new.UNIDADENEGOCIO <> old.UNIDADENEGOCIO) or (new.UNIDADENEGOCIO is null and old.UNIDADENEGOCIO is not null) or (new.UNIDADENEGOCIO is not null and old.UNIDADENEGOCIO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'UNIDADENEGOCIO',old.UNIDADENEGOCIO,new.UNIDADENEGOCIO);
 end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGADLOG_NOTAMED" FOR "NOTAMED" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED',OLD.A_NOTAMED,'D') into :indice;
if (old.APRAZADA is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'APRAZADA',old.APRAZADA,null);
if (old.A_CODIGO1 is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_CODIGO1',old.A_CODIGO1,null);
if (old.A_MEDICOS is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_MEDICOS',old.A_MEDICOS,null);
if (old.A_NOTAMED is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_NOTAMED',old.A_NOTAMED,null);
if (old.CODIGO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CODIGO',old.CODIGO,null);
if (old.CODIGOCPS is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CODIGOCPS',old.CODIGOCPS,null);
if (old.CONTEUDO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CONTEUDO',old.CONTEUDO,null);
if (old.CONTINUACAO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CONTINUACAO',old.CONTINUACAO,null);
if (old.DATAHORA is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DATAHORA',old.DATAHORA,null);
if (old.DATAHORAVALIDADE is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DATAHORAVALIDADE',old.DATAHORAVALIDADE,null);
if (old.DISPENSADOR is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DISPENSADOR',old.DISPENSADOR,null);
if (old.EVOLUCAO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'EVOLUCAO',old.EVOLUCAO,null);
if (old.HORAINICIO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'HORAINICIO',old.HORAINICIO,null);
if (old.IMPRESSAODISPENSA is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'IMPRESSAODISPENSA',old.IMPRESSAODISPENSA,null);
if (old.IMPRESSO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'IMPRESSO',old.IMPRESSO,null);
if (old.INTERCOR is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'INTERCOR',old.INTERCOR,null);
if (old.ISOLAMENTO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'ISOLAMENTO',old.ISOLAMENTO,null);
if (old.MODELO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'MODELO',old.MODELO,null);
if (old.REPOUSO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'REPOUSO',old.REPOUSO,null);
if (old.TRATAMENTO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'TRATAMENTO',old.TRATAMENTO,null);
if (old.UNIDADENEGOCIO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'UNIDADENEGOCIO',old.UNIDADENEGOCIO,null);
 end
 ^

ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED10',OLD.SEQUENCIA,'D') into :indice;
if (old.GAS is not null) then

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMED12" FOR "NOTAMED12" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED12, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_NOTAMED12" FOR "NOTAMED12" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_NOTAMED12_EQUIPOVAZIA" FOR "NOTAMED12" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 50
AS BEGIN
 IF (NEW.EQUIPO IS NULL) THEN
   NEW.EQUIPO = '';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMED12" FOR "NOTAMED12" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMED12',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_NOTAMED12" FOR "NOTAMED12" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_NOTAMED12" FOR "NOTAMED12" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAULOG_NOTAMED12" FOR "NOTAMED12" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED12',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'U') into :indice;
if ((new.APRESENTACAO <> old.APRESENTACAO) or (new.APRESENTACAO is null and old.APRESENTACAO is not null) or (new.APRESENTACAO is not null and old.APRESENTACAO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'APRESENTACAO',old.APRESENTACAO,new.APRESENTACAO);
if ((new.ELETROLITO <> old.ELETROLITO) or (new.ELETROLITO is null and old.ELETROLITO is not null) or (new.ELETROLITO is not null and old.ELETROLITO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'ELETROLITO',old.ELETROLITO,new.ELETROLITO);

 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'EQUIPO',old.EQUIPO,new.EQUIPO);

 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY7',old.QY7,new.QY7);
if ((new.QY8 <> old.QY8) or (new.QY8 is null and old.QY8 is not null) or (new.QY8 is not null and old.QY8 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY8',old.QY8,new.QY8);
if ((new.QY9 <> old.QY9) or (new.QY9 is null and old.QY9 is not null) or (new.QY9 is not null and old.QY9 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY9',old.QY9,new.QY9);
if ((new.SEQUENCIA <> old.SEQUENCIA) or (new.SEQUENCIA is null and old.SEQUENCIA is not null) or (new.SEQUENCIA is not null and old.SEQUENCIA is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'SEQUENCIA',old.SEQUENCIA,new.SEQUENCIA);
if ((new.SOLUCAO <> old.SOLUCAO) or (new.SOLUCAO is null and old.SOLUCAO is not null) or (new.SOLUCAO is not null and old.SOLUCAO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'SOLUCAO',old.SOLUCAO,new.SOLUCAO);
 end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMED13" FOR "NOTAMED13" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
    NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED13, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMED13" FOR "NOTAMED13" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMED13',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAULOG_NOTAMED13" FOR "NOTAMED13" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED13',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'U') into :indice;
if ((new.DESCRICAO <> old.DESCRICAO) or (new.DESCRICAO is null and old.DESCRICAO is not null) or (new.DESCRICAO is not null and old.DESCRICAO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DESCRICAO',old.DESCRICAO,new.DESCRICAO);
if ((new.H1 <> old.H1) or (new.H1 is null and old.H1 is not null) or (new.H1 is not null and old.H1 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'H1',old.H1,new.H1);

 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'SEQUENCIA',old.SEQUENCIA,new.SEQUENCIA);
 end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGADLOG_NOTAMED13" FOR "NOTAMED13" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED13',OLD.SEQUENCIA,'D') into :indice;
if (old.DESCRICAO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DESCRICAO',old.DESCRICAO,null);

 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'H1',old.H1,null);

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMED2" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED2, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_NOTAMED2" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_NOTAMED2_KITVAZIO" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 100
AS
begin
  if (new.a_kits is null) then
    new.a_kits = 0;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_NOTAMED2_ORDEM" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 100
as begin
  if (
     (new.ordem = '1') or (new.ordem = '2') or
     (new.ordem = '3') or (new.ordem = '4') or
     (new.ordem = '5') or (new.ordem = '6') or
     (new.ordem = '7') or (new.ordem = '8') or
     (new.ordem = '1 ') or (new.ordem = '2 ') or
     (new.ordem = '3 ') or (new.ordem = '4 ') or
     (new.ordem = '5 ') or (new.ordem = '6 ') or
     (new.ordem = '7 ') or (new.ordem = '8 ') or
     (new.ordem = '9') or (new.ordem = '9 ')
     )
   then
     new.ordem = '0' || new.ordem;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMED2" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMED2',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_NOTAMED2" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_NOTAMED2" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_MUDAKIT" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
INACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
as begin
  if (new.a_kits <> old.a_kits) then
  begin
    EXCEPTION EXC_MUDARMEDICACAO;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_NOTAMED2_ORDEM" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 100
as begin
  if (
     (new.ordem = '1') or (new.ordem = '2') or
     (new.ordem = '3') or (new.ordem = '4') or
     (new.ordem = '5') or (new.ordem = '6') or
     (new.ordem = '7') or (new.ordem = '8') or
     (new.ordem = '1 ') or (new.ordem = '2 ') or
     (new.ordem = '3 ') or (new.ordem = '4 ') or
     (new.ordem = '5 ') or (new.ordem = '6 ') or
     (new.ordem = '7 ') or (new.ordem = '8 ') or
     (new.ordem = '9') or (new.ordem = '9 ')
     )
   then
     new.ordem = '0' || new.ordem;
end
 ^

 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'OK13',old.OK13,new.OK13);

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL_X_NOTAMED2" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
BEGIN
insert into XNOTAMED2
  (    A_NOTAMED,  A_KITS,  MEDICAMENT,  POSOLOGIA,  QUANTIDADE,  A_MEDIDAS,  NUMERO,  CODIGO,  A_CODIGO1,  DILUENTE,  VIA,  ORDEM,  DATA2,  DATASINC,  HORA1,  OK1,  QX1,  QY1,  HORA2,  OK2,  QX2,  QY2,  HORA3,  OK3,  QX3,  QY3,  HORA4,  OK4,  QX4,  QY4,  HORA5,
  OK5,  QX5,  QY5,  HORA6,  OK6,  QX6,  QY6,  HORA7,  OK7,  QX7,  QY7,  HORA8,  OK8,  QX8,  QY8,  HORA9,
  OK9,  QX9,  QY9,  HORA10,  OK10,  QX10,  QY10,  HORA11,  OK11,  QX11,  QY11,  HORA12,
  OK12,  QX12,  QY12,  HORARIO1,  HORARIO2,  HORARIO3,  HORARIO4,  HORARIO5,
  HORARIO6,  HORARIO7,  HORARIO8,  HORARIO9,  HORARIO10,  HORARIO11,  HORARIO12,  SUSPENSO,
  SUSPENSO_JUSTIF,  SUSPENSO_DATA,  SUSPENSO_USER,  OK13,  OK14,  OK15,  OK16,  OK17,  OK18,  OK19,  OK20,  OK21,
  OK22,  OK23,  OK24,  QX13,  QX14,  QX15,  QX16,  QX17,  QX18,  QX19,  QX20,  QX21,  QX22,  QX23,  QX24,  QY13,
  QY14,  QY15,  QY16,  QY17,  QY18,  QY19,  QY20,  QY21,  QY22,  QY23,  QY24)
SELECT
    A_NOTAMED,  A_KITS,  MEDICAMENT,  POSOLOGIA,  QUANTIDADE,  A_MEDIDAS,  NUMERO,  CODIGO,  A_CODIGO1,  DILUENTE,  VIA,  ORDEM,  DATA2,  DATASINC,  HORA1,  OK1,  QX1,  QY1,  HORA2,  OK2,  QX2,  QY2,  HORA3,  OK3,  QX3,  QY3,  HORA4,  OK4,  QX4,  QY4,  HORA5,
  OK5,  QX5,  QY5,  HORA6,  OK6,  QX6,  QY6,  HORA7,  OK7,  QX7,  QY7,  HORA8,  OK8,  QX8,  QY8,  HORA9,
  OK9,  QX9,  QY9,  HORA10,  OK10,  QX10,  QY10,  HORA11,  OK11,  QX11,  QY11,  HORA12,
  OK12,  QX12,  QY12,  HORARIO1,  HORARIO2,  HORARIO3,  HORARIO4,  HORARIO5,
  HORARIO6,  HORARIO7,  HORARIO8,  HORARIO9,  HORARIO10,  HORARIO11,  HORARIO12,  SUSPENSO,
  SUSPENSO_JUSTIF,  SUSPENSO_DATA,  SUSPENSO_USER,  OK13,  OK14,  OK15,  OK16,  OK17,  OK18,  OK19,  OK20,  OK21,
  OK22,  OK23,  OK24,  QX13,  QX14,  QX15,  QX16,  QX17,  QX18,  QX19,  QX20,  QX21,  QX22,  QX23,  QX24,  QY13,
  QY14,  QY15,  QY16,  QY17,  QY18,  QY19,  QY20,  QY21,  QY22,  QY23,  QY24
FROM NOTAMED2
WHERE SEQUENCIA = OLD.SEQUENCIA;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGADLOG_NOTAMED2" FOR "NOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED2',OLD.SEQUENCIA,'D') into :indice;
if (old.A_CODIGO1 is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_CODIGO1',old.A_CODIGO1,null);
if (old.A_KITS is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_KITS',old.A_KITS,null);
if (old.A_MEDIDAS is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_MEDIDAS',old.A_MEDIDAS,null);
if (old.A_NOTAMED is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_NOTAMED',old.A_NOTAMED,null);
if (old.CODIGO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CODIGO',old.CODIGO,null);
if (old.DIA_USOANTIBIOTICO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DIA_USOANTIBIOTICO',old.DIA_USOANTIBIOTICO,null);
if (old.DILUENTE is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DILUENTE',old.DILUENTE,null);
if (old.DOSE is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DOSE',old.DOSE,null);
if (old.FIM_TRATAMENTO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'FIM_TRATAMENTO',old.FIM_TRATAMENTO,null);
if (old.H1 is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'H1',old.H1,null);
if (old.H10 is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'H10',old.H10,null);
if (old.H11 is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'H11',old.H11,null);
if (old.H12 is not null) then

 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMED3" FOR "NOTAMED3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED3, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_NOTAMED3" FOR "NOTAMED3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMED3" FOR "NOTAMED3" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMED3',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_NOTAMED3" FOR "NOTAMED3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_NOTAMED3" FOR "NOTAMED3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAULOG_NOTAMED3" FOR "NOTAMED3" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED3',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'U') into :indice;
if ((new.AUTORIZADO <> old.AUTORIZADO) or (new.AUTORIZADO is null and old.AUTORIZADO is not null) or (new.AUTORIZADO is not null and old.AUTORIZADO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'AUTORIZADO',old.AUTORIZADO,new.AUTORIZADO);
if ((new.A_DATA1 <> old.A_DATA1) or (new.A_DATA1 is null and old.A_DATA1 is not null) or (new.A_DATA1 is not null and old.A_DATA1 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_DATA1',old.A_DATA1,new.A_DATA1);

 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_DRENO',old.A_DRENO,new.A_DRENO);

 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_MEDICOS',old.A_MEDICOS,new.A_MEDICOS);

 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGADLOG_NOTAMED3" FOR "NOTAMED3" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED3',OLD.SEQUENCIA,'D') into :indice;
if (old.AUTORIZADO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'AUTORIZADO',old.AUTORIZADO,null);
if (old.A_DATA1 is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_DATA1',old.A_DATA1,null);
if (old.A_DRENO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_DRENO',old.A_DRENO,null);
if (old.A_MEDICOS is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_MEDICOS',old.A_MEDICOS,null);
if (old.A_NOTAMED is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'A_NOTAMED',old.A_NOTAMED,null);
if (old.CODIGOAMB is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CODIGOAMB',old.CODIGOAMB,null);
if (old.CODIGOSERV is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CODIGOSERV',old.CODIGOSERV,null);
if (old.CODIGOUSU is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CODIGOUSU',old.CODIGOUSU,null);

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMED4" FOR "NOTAMED4" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED4, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_NOTAMED4" FOR "NOTAMED4" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMED4" FOR "NOTAMED4" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMED4',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_NOTAMED4" FOR "NOTAMED4" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_NOTAMED4" FOR "NOTAMED4" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAULOG_NOTAMED4" FOR "NOTAMED4" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);

as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMED5" FOR "NOTAMED5" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED5, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_NOTAMED5" FOR "NOTAMED5" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMED5" FOR "NOTAMED5" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMED5',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_NOTAMED5" FOR "NOTAMED5" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_NOTAMED5" FOR "NOTAMED5" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAULOG_NOTAMED5" FOR "NOTAMED5" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED5',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'U') into :indice;
if ((new.H1 <> old.H1) or (new.H1 is null and old.H1 is not null) or (new.H1 is not null and old.H1 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'H1',old.H1,new.H1);

 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGADLOG_NOTAMED5" FOR "NOTAMED5" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED5',OLD.SEQUENCIA,'D') into :indice;
if (old.H1 is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'H1',old.H1,null);
if (old.H10 is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'H10',old.H10,null);
if (old.H11 is not null) then

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMED6" FOR "NOTAMED6" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED6, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_NOTAMED6" FOR "NOTAMED6" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMED6" FOR "NOTAMED6" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMED6',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_NOTAMED6" FOR "NOTAMED6" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_NOTAMED6" FOR "NOTAMED6" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 200

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMED7" FOR "NOTAMED7" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED7, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_NOTAMED7" FOR "NOTAMED7" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMED7" FOR "NOTAMED7" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMED7',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_NOTAMED7" FOR "NOTAMED7" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_NOTAMED7" FOR "NOTAMED7" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAULOG_NOTAMED7" FOR "NOTAMED7" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED7',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'U') into :indice;
if ((new.APLICACAO <> old.APLICACAO) or (new.APLICACAO is null and old.APLICACAO is not null) or (new.APLICACAO is not null and old.APLICACAO is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'APLICACAO',old.APLICACAO,new.APLICACAO);

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGADLOG_NOTAMED7" FOR "NOTAMED7" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED7',OLD.SEQUENCIA,'D') into :indice;
if (old.APLICACAO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'APLICACAO',old.APLICACAO,null);
if (old.APRESENTACAO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'APRESENTACAO',old.APRESENTACAO,null);
if (old.ELETROLITO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'ELETROLITO',old.ELETROLITO,null);
if (old.EQUIPO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'EQUIPO',old.EQUIPO,null);
if (old.H1 is not null) then

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMED8" FOR "NOTAMED8" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED8, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_NOTAMED8" FOR "NOTAMED8" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMED8" FOR "NOTAMED8" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMED8',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_NOTAMED8" FOR "NOTAMED8" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_NOTAMED8" FOR "NOTAMED8" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMED9" FOR "NOTAMED9" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMED9, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_NOTAMED9" FOR "NOTAMED9" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMED9" FOR "NOTAMED9" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMED9',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_NOTAMED9" FOR "NOTAMED9" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_NOTAMED9" FOR "NOTAMED9" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 200

 declare variable indice varchar(30);

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGADLOG_NOTAMED9" FOR "NOTAMED9" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMED9',OLD.SEQUENCIA,'D') into :indice;
if (old.H1 is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'H1',old.H1,null);
if (old.H10 is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'H10',old.H10,null);

 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_NOTAMEDDIETA" FOR "NOTAMEDDIETA" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAMEDDIETA" FOR "NOTAMEDDIETA" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.CODIGO = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAMEDDIETA, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAMEDDIETA" FOR "NOTAMEDDIETA" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAMEDDIETA',NEW.CODIGO,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_NOTAMEDDIETA" FOR "NOTAMEDDIETA" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_NOTAMEDDIETA" FOR "NOTAMEDDIETA" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAULOG_NOTAMEDDIETA" FOR "NOTAMEDDIETA" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);

select indice from insertlog('NOTAMEDDIETA',NEW.CODIGO,'U') into :indice;

 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CODIGO',old.CODIGO,new.CODIGO);

 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY16',old.QY16,new.QY16);
if ((new.QY17 <> old.QY17) or (new.QY17 is null and old.QY17 is not null) or (new.QY17 is not null and old.QY17 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY17',old.QY17,new.QY17);
if ((new.QY18 <> old.QY18) or (new.QY18 is null and old.QY18 is not null) or (new.QY18 is not null and old.QY18 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY18',old.QY18,new.QY18);
if ((new.QY19 <> old.QY19) or (new.QY19 is null and old.QY19 is not null) or (new.QY19 is not null and old.QY19 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY19',old.QY19,new.QY19);
if ((new.QY2 <> old.QY2) or (new.QY2 is null and old.QY2 is not null) or (new.QY2 is not null and old.QY2 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY2',old.QY2,new.QY2);
if ((new.QY20 <> old.QY20) or (new.QY20 is null and old.QY20 is not null) or (new.QY20 is not null and old.QY20 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY20',old.QY20,new.QY20);
if ((new.QY21 <> old.QY21) or (new.QY21 is null and old.QY21 is not null) or (new.QY21 is not null and old.QY21 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY21',old.QY21,new.QY21);
if ((new.QY22 <> old.QY22) or (new.QY22 is null and old.QY22 is not null) or (new.QY22 is not null and old.QY22 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY22',old.QY22,new.QY22);
if ((new.QY23 <> old.QY23) or (new.QY23 is null and old.QY23 is not null) or (new.QY23 is not null and old.QY23 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY23',old.QY23,new.QY23);
if ((new.QY24 <> old.QY24) or (new.QY24 is null and old.QY24 is not null) or (new.QY24 is not null and old.QY24 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY24',old.QY24,new.QY24);
if ((new.QY3 <> old.QY3) or (new.QY3 is null and old.QY3 is not null) or (new.QY3 is not null and old.QY3 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY3',old.QY3,new.QY3);
if ((new.QY4 <> old.QY4) or (new.QY4 is null and old.QY4 is not null) or (new.QY4 is not null and old.QY4 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY4',old.QY4,new.QY4);
if ((new.QY5 <> old.QY5) or (new.QY5 is null and old.QY5 is not null) or (new.QY5 is not null and old.QY5 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY5',old.QY5,new.QY5);
if ((new.QY6 <> old.QY6) or (new.QY6 is null and old.QY6 is not null) or (new.QY6 is not null and old.QY6 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY6',old.QY6,new.QY6);
if ((new.QY7 <> old.QY7) or (new.QY7 is null and old.QY7 is not null) or (new.QY7 is not null and old.QY7 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY7',old.QY7,new.QY7);
if ((new.QY8 <> old.QY8) or (new.QY8 is null and old.QY8 is not null) or (new.QY8 is not null and old.QY8 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY8',old.QY8,new.QY8);
if ((new.QY9 <> old.QY9) or (new.QY9 is null and old.QY9 is not null) or (new.QY9 is not null and old.QY9 is null)) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'QY9',old.QY9,new.QY9);
 end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGADLOG_NOTAMEDDIETA" FOR "NOTAMEDDIETA" 
ACTIVE AFTER DELETE POSITION 200
as
 declare variable indice varchar(30);
 begin
select indice from insertlog('NOTAMEDDIETA',OLD.CODIGO,'D') into :indice;
if (old.CODIGO is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'CODIGO',old.CODIGO,null);
if (old.DIETA is not null) then
 execute procedure insertlogitem(:indice,'DIETA',old.DIETA,null);
if (old.HORA1 is not null) then

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAPACIENTE" FOR "NOTAPACIENTE" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.INDICE = GEN_ID( GEN_NOTAPACIENTE, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_NOTAPACIENTE_DATA" FOR "NOTAPACIENTE" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   IF (NEW.DATA IS NULL) THEN
      NEW.DATA = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_NOTAPACIENTE" FOR "NOTAPACIENTE" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
    new.indice = GEN_ID( gen_notapaciente, 1 );
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_NOTAPACIENTE" FOR "NOTAPACIENTE" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('NOTAPACIENTE',NEW.INDICE,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "ALTERA_PACBACKUP" FOR "PACIENTE" 
INACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
as
BEGIN
insert into X_PACBACKUP
( CODIGOPACOFICIAL,
  A_NOME,
  ENDERECO,
  MATRICULA,
  IDENTIDADE,
  NASC,
  CONSULTA,
  TRABALHO,
  SEGURADO,
  GAVETA,
  GAVETA1,
  NATURALIDADE,
  PAI,
  MAE,
  CODIGO,
  A_CODIGO1,
  SEXO,
  A_CPF,
  CEP,
  BAIRRO,
  CIDADE,
  A_MEDICOS,
  UF,
  CIVIL,
  CADASTRADOEM,
  IMPRESSO,
  COR,
  CONVENIO,
  CODIGOANTIGO,
  TRABALHO1,
  EMAIL,
  SANGUE,
  FATORRH,
  OBSERVACAO,
  ATIVO,
  USER1,
  USER2,
  DATA1,
  DATA2,
  ANAMNESE,
  PREVIDENCIA,
  SUS,
  PLANO,
  VALIDADE,
  PRODUTO,
  CARTAO,
  CONVPLANO,
  IMPORTA,
  AREA,
  PREFERENCIA,
  OBSERVACAOMED,
  SENHA,
  DATASINC,
  NUMERO,
  COMPLEMENTO,
  APELIDO,
  IP,
  VERSAO,
  IP1,
  VERSAO1,
  FR1,
  FR2,
  FR3,
  FR4,
  FR5,
  FR6,
  FR7,
  FR8,
  FR9,
  FR10,
  FR11,
  FR12,
  FR13,
  FR14,
  FR15,
  FR16,
  RGORGAO,
  ESCOLARIDADE,
  RGUF,
  BOLSAFAMILIA,
  MICROAREA,
  POSTO,
  MAT_FIN,
  OML,
  CORPO,
  QUADRO,
  ESPEC,
  NUMBOL,
  ANOBOL,
  AP,
  PARENTE,
  SITUACAO,
  INIFUS,
  SIAPE,
  NIPTITULAR,
  SISPRENATAL,
  IMH,
  IMPORTADO,
  PRONTUARIO,
  LIBERADOTEMP,
  CERTIDAONASC
)
SELECT
  CODIGOPAC,
  A_NOME,
  ENDERECO,
  MATRICULA,
  IDENTIDADE,
  NASC,
  CONSULTA,
  TRABALHO,
  SEGURADO,
  GAVETA,
  GAVETA1,
  NATURALIDADE,
  PAI,
  MAE,
  CODIGO,
  A_CODIGO1,
  SEXO,
  A_CPF,
  CEP,
  BAIRRO,
  CIDADE,
  A_MEDICOS,
  UF,
  CIVIL,
  CADASTRADOEM,
  IMPRESSO,
  COR,
  CONVENIO,
  CODIGOANTIGO,
  TRABALHO1,
  EMAIL,
  SANGUE,
  FATORRH,
  OBSERVACAO,
  ATIVO,
  USER1,
  USER2,
  DATA1,
  DATA2,
  ANAMNESE,
  PREVIDENCIA,
  SUS,
  PLANO,
  VALIDADE,
  PRODUTO,
  CARTAO,
  CONVPLANO,
  IMPORTA,
  AREA,
  PREFERENCIA,
  OBSERVACAOMED,
  SENHA,
  DATASINC,
  NUMERO,
  COMPLEMENTO,
  APELIDO,
  IP,
  VERSAO,
  IP1,
  VERSAO1,
  FR1,
  FR2,
  FR3,
  FR4,
  FR5,
  FR6,
  FR7,
  FR8,
  FR9,
  FR10,
  FR11,
  FR12,
  FR13,
  FR14,
  FR15,
  FR16,
  RGORGAO,
  ESCOLARIDADE,
  RGUF,
  BOLSAFAMILIA,
  MICROAREA,
  POSTO,
  MAT_FIN,
  OML,
  CORPO,
  QUADRO,
  ESPEC,
  NUMBOL,
  ANOBOL,
  AP,
  PARENTE,
  SITUACAO,
  INIFUS,
  SIAPE,
  NIPTITULAR,
  SISPRENATAL,
  IMH,
  IMPORTADO,
  PRONTUARIO,
  LIBERADOTEMP,
  CERTIDAONASC
FROM PACIENTE
WHERE CODIGOPAC = OLD.CODIGOPAC;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_PACIENTE" FOR "PACIENTE" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_PACIENTE" FOR "PACIENTE" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRIG_AU_PACFUSMA" FOR "PACIENTE" 
INACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 20
as
BEGIN
   IF (new.VALIDADE <> old.VALIDADE) THEN
   BEGIN
       INSERT INTO AUDITA_VALIDADE_FUSMA (CODIGOPAC, INICIO, VALIDADE, USUARIO, DATASINC)
       VALUES(old.CODIGOPAC, old.INIFUS, old.VALIDADE, NEW.A_CODIGO1, 'NOW');
   END
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL_PACIENTE" FOR "PACIENTE" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   INSERT INTO X_PACIENTE (CODIGOPAC, A_NOME, ENDERECO, MATRICULA, IDENTIDADE, NASC, CONSULTA, TRABALHO, SEGURADO,
  GAVETA, GAVETA1, NATURALIDADE, PAI, MAE, CODIGO, A_CODIGO1, SEXO, A_CPF, CEP, BAIRRO, CIDADE,
  A_MEDICOS, UF, CIVIL, CADASTRADOEM, IMPRESSO, COR, CONVENIO, CODIGOANTIGO,
  TRABALHO1, EMAIL, SANGUE, FATORRH, OBSERVACAO, ATIVO, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2) SELECT CODIGOPAC, A_NOME, ENDERECO, MATRICULA, IDENTIDADE, NASC, CONSULTA, TRABALHO, SEGURADO,
  GAVETA, GAVETA1, NATURALIDADE, PAI, MAE, CODIGO, A_CODIGO1, SEXO, A_CPF, CEP, BAIRRO, CIDADE,
  A_MEDICOS, UF, CIVIL, CADASTRADOEM, IMPRESSO, COR, CONVENIO, CODIGOANTIGO,
  TRABALHO1, EMAIL, SANGUE, FATORRH, OBSERVACAO, ATIVO, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2 FROM PACIENTE WHERE CODIGOPAC = OLD.CODIGOPAC;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_PACIENTECPR" FOR "PACIENTECPR" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.INDICE = GEN_ID( GEN_PACIENTECPR, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_PACIENTECPR" FOR "PACIENTECPR" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('PACIENTECPR',NEW.INDICE,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_PRESCITEMSOL" FOR "PRESCITEMSOL" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as begin
  if (new.indice is null) then
    new.indice = gen_id(gen_prescitemsol,1);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBU_PRESCAPRAZ_QX" FOR "PRESCRICAOAPRAZ" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
as begin
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '1')) then
    update notamed2 set qx1 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '2')) then
    update notamed2 set qx2 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '3')) then
    update notamed2 set qx3 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '4')) then
    update notamed2 set qx4 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '5')) then
    update notamed2 set qx5 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '6')) then
    update notamed2 set qx6 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '7')) then
    update notamed2 set qx7 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '8')) then
    update notamed2 set qx8 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '9')) then
    update notamed2 set qx9 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '10')) then
    update notamed2 set qx10 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '11')) then
    update notamed2 set qx11 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'S') and (new.horario = '12')) then
    update notamed2 set qx12 = '0' where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '1')) then
    update notamed2 set qx1 = null where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '2')) then
    update notamed2 set qx2 = null where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '3')) then
    update notamed2 set qx3 = null where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '4')) then
    update notamed2 set qx4 = null where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '5')) then
    update notamed2 set qx5 = null where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '6')) then
    update notamed2 set qx6 = null where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '7')) then
    update notamed2 set qx7 = null where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '8')) then
    update notamed2 set qx8 = null where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '9')) then
    update notamed2 set qx9 = null where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '10')) then
    update notamed2 set qx10 = nuLL where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '11')) then
    update notamed2 set qx11 = nuLL where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
  if ((new.suspenso = 'N') and (new.horario = '12')) then
    update notamed2 set qx12 = null where a_notamed = new.prescricao and sequencia = new.indice;
end
 ^

ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 1
as begin
  if (new.codigocps <> old.codigocps) then
  exception EXC_TRAVAMUDAPACIENTEASSIST;
end

CREATE TRIGGER "TRIG_BI_SERVICOS_SP" FOR "SERVICOS" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 5
as
BEGIN
   IF ( NEW.SP IS NULL ) THEN
        NEW.SP = 0;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_SERVICOS_DHE_RUQE" FOR "SERVICOS" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 40
AS BEGIN
  if (new.a_tipo in ('R','U','Q','E')) then
    new.dhe = 'N';
END
 ^

as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('SIMPRO',NEW.SEQUENCIA,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_SIMPRO" FOR "SIMPRO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_SIMPRO" FOR "SIMPRO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_SIMPRO2" FOR "SIMPRO2"

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_BI_SIMPRO_LAYOUT2" FOR "SIMPRO_LAYOUT2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as begin
new.IDSIMPRO_LAYOUT2 = gen_id(gen_SIMPRO_LAYOUT2,1);
update matmed set tussbras = new.codigo_tuss where simpro = cast(new.codigo_usuario as integer) and (tussbras is null or tussbras = '') AND SIMPRO IS NOT NULL;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_SIMPRO_LAYOUT2" FOR "SIMPRO_LAYOUT2" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('SIMPRO_LAYOUT2',NEW.IDSIMPRO_LAYOUT2,'I') into indice; end
 ^

 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_SMSLISTA" FOR "SMSLISTA" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as begin
  new.indice = gen_id(gen_smsLista,1);
  NEW.DATAINC = 'NOW';
  NEW.DATA = 'NOW';
    IF (NEW.TELEFONE LIKE '550%') THEN
        NEW.TELEFONE = '55' || SUBSTR(NEW.TELEFONE, 4,30);
   IF (NEW.TELEFONE LIKE '0%') THEN
        NEW.TELEFONE = SUBSTR(NEW.TELEFONE, 2,30);
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRBI_TIPOPROGRAMASAUDE" FOR "TIPOPROGRAMASAUDE" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
as
begin
    new.TIPOPROGRAMASAUDE = GEN_ID( TIPOPROGRAMASAUDE, 1 );
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_TIPOPROGRAMASAUDE" FOR "TIPOPROGRAMASAUDE" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('TIPOPROGRAMASAUDE',NEW.TIPOPROGRAMASAUDE,'I') into indice; end
 ^

ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
BEGIN
  NEW.INDICE = GEN_ID(GEN_TISSDOMINIO,1);
  if (new.versao is null) then
  NEW.VERSAO = '3.02.00';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INSUSUARIO" FOR "USUARIOS"

   NEW.CODIGO = GEN_ID( GEN_USUARIO, 1 );

 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_USUARIO" FOR "USUARIOS" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
as
begin
   new.HTML = '';
   new.ativo = 'S';
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC1_USUARIOS" FOR "USUARIOS" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGBI_USUARIO_SBIS" FOR "USUARIOS" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (gen_id(gen_sbis,0) = 1) then
  begin
    If (exists(select codigo from usuarios where a_cpf = new.a_cpf and codigo <> new.codigo)) then
      exception exc_acaobloqueada;
  end
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAILOG_USUARIOS" FOR "USUARIOS" 
ACTIVE AFTER INSERT POSITION 200
as declare variable indice varchar(30); begin select indice from INSERTlog('USUARIOS',NEW.CODIGO,'I') into indice; end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_USUARIOS" FOR "USUARIOS" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATASINC = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "UP_USUARIO" FOR "USUARIOS" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 0
as
begin
       NEW.HTML = '';
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DC_USUARIOS" FOR "USUARIOS" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 20
AS BEGIN NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW'; END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRGAU_USUARIO_SBIS" FOR "USUARIOS" 
ACTIVE AFTER UPDATE POSITION 20
as
begin
  if (gen_id(gen_sbis,0) = 1) then
  begin
    If (exists(select codigo from usuarios where a_cpf = new.a_cpf and codigo <> new.codigo)) then
      exception exc_acaobloqueada;
  end
end
 ^

ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 1
as begin
  if (new.codigocps <> old.codigocps) then
  exception EXC_TRAVAMUDAPACIENTEASSIST;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRIG_BI_XMLDEMONSTRATIVO" FOR "XMLDEMONSTRATIVO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 10
as
BEGIN
   NEW.INDICE = GEN_ID(gen_demonstrativo,1);
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "TRIG_BU_XMLDEMONSTRATIVO_GUIAOP" FOR "XMLDEMONSTRATIVO" 
ACTIVE BEFORE UPDATE POSITION 10
as
BEGIN
   IF ( NEW.TRATAMENTO > 0 ) THEN
   BEGIN
      UPDATE INTER2 SET NUMEROGUIAOPERADORA = NEW.NUMEROGUIAOPERADORA WHERE CODIGOINT = NEW.CODIGOCPS AND TRATAMENTO = NEW.TRATAMENTO AND ( ( NUMEROGUIAOPERADORA <> NEW.NUMEROGUIAOPERADORA ) OR ( NUMEROGUIAOPERADORA IS NULL) );
   END
   ELSE IF (NEW.TRATAMENTO = 0) THEN
   BEGIN
      UPDATE CPS1 SET NUMEROGUIAOPERADORA = NEW.NUMEROGUIAOPERADORA WHERE CODIGOCPS = NEW.CODIGOCPS AND ( TRATAMENTO = 0 or tratamento is null) AND ( ( NUMEROGUIAOPERADORA <> NEW.NUMEROGUIAOPERADORA ) OR ( NUMEROGUIAOPERADORA IS NULL) );
   END
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_XNOTAMED2" FOR "XNOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.SEQUENCIA = GEN_ID( GEN_XNOTAMED2, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "SINC2_XNOTAMED2" FOR "XNOTAMED2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
NEW.DATA2 = 'NOW';
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "INS_XXX_INTER2" FOR "XXX_INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE INSERT POSITION 0
AS
BEGIN
   NEW.INTER2NO = GEN_ID( GEN_XXX_INTER2, 1 );
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL_XXX_INTER2" FOR "XXX_INTER2" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
BEGIN
insert into INTER2
  (CODIGOINT,TRATAMENTO, CONVENIO, A_VIA, A_DATA, A_HORA,
   A_DATAFIM, A_HORAFIM, A_ENVIO, DOCUMENTOS, A_DATADIA, FATURA,
   CODIGO, A_VALOR, A_GLOSA, A_VALOR1, MARCADO, PARCELA, TIPOGUIA, MOTIVOALTA,
   FATURANO, MEDICA, ENFERMAGEM, ADM, OBSERVACAO, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2, MEDICOSOL, TIPO,CODSERV1,
   CODSERV2,CODSERV3,OBSERVACAO2,  DIARIA, DESCONTO, DATASINC,
   FATURAGLOSA,  A_GUIA,  DATARECEBIMENTO,  IP,  VERSAO,  IP1,  VERSAO1,  DIARIAAUTO,
   DIARIAHORA,  TRAVADIA,  ASSISTAUTO,  TIPOACOMODACAO,  TIPOENFERMARIA,  DATAGLOSA,
   USERGLOSA,  ALTAMEDICO,  ALTAANESTESISTA,  ALTAAUDITOR,  ALTAFARMACIA,  ALTAENFERMAGEM,  TIPOALTATISS,
   TRATAMENTO2)
SELECT
   CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, CONVENIO, A_VIA, A_DATA, A_HORA,
   A_DATAFIM, A_HORAFIM, A_ENVIO, DOCUMENTOS, A_DATADIA, FATURA,
   CODIGO, A_VALOR, A_GLOSA, A_VALOR1, MARCADO, PARCELA, TIPOGUIA, MOTIVOALTA,
   FATURANO, MEDICA, ENFERMAGEM, ADM, OBSERVACAO, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2, MEDICOSOL, TIPO,CODSERV1,
   CODSERV2,CODSERV3,OBSERVACAO2,  DIARIA, DESCONTO, DATASINC,
   FATURAGLOSA,  A_GUIA,  DATARECEBIMENTO,  IP,  VERSAO,  IP1,  VERSAO1,  DIARIAAUTO,
   DIARIAHORA,  TRAVADIA,  ASSISTAUTO,  TIPOACOMODACAO,  TIPOENFERMARIA,  DATAGLOSA,
   USERGLOSA,  ALTAMEDICO,  ALTAANESTESISTA,  ALTAAUDITOR,  ALTAFARMACIA,  ALTAENFERMAGEM,  TIPOALTATISS,
   TRATAMENTO2
FROM XXX_INTER2
WHERE INTER2NO = OLD.INTER2NO;
DELETE FROM X_INTER3  WHERE CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO;
DELETE FROM X_INTER32 WHERE CODIGOINT = OLD.CODIGOINT AND TRATAMENTO = OLD.TRATAMENTO;
END
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DELETAX_INTER3" FOR "X_INTER3" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
begin
  insert into INTER3
     ( CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, A_DATA, A_HORA, CODIGOSERV, A_MEDICOS,
         QUANTIDADE, A_CODMOE, A_QUANTIDADE, CODIGO, VALOR, CODIGOAMB, GLOSA,
         DHE,SENHA, PORTE, CODESP, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2, REPRESENTA, A_FILME,
         CODIGOAMB1, GLOSARECEBIDA, GLOSADATA, GLOSATIPO, DATAINICIO, DATAFIM,
         TIPOCOB, CO, COBRAR, GLOSARESPONSAVEL, GLOSADEFINITIVA, DATASINC,
         UNIDADENEGOCIO, IP, VERSAO, IP1, VERSAO1, RSGLOSA, TECNICA,
         GRAUPARTICIPACAO, HORAFINAL, PACOTE, DATAGLOSA, USERGLOSA, CUSTO,
	 A_SITUACAO, JUSTIFICATIVA)
  SELECT CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, A_DATA, A_HORA, CODIGOSERV, A_MEDICOS,
         QUANTIDADE, A_CODMOE, A_QUANTIDADE, CODIGO, VALOR, CODIGOAMB, GLOSA,
         DHE,SENHA, PORTE, CODESP, USER1, USER2, DATA1, DATA2, REPRESENTA, A_FILME,
         CODIGOAMB1, GLOSARECEBIDA, GLOSADATA, GLOSATIPO, DATAINICIO, DATAFIM,
         TIPOCOB, CO, COBRAR, GLOSARESPONSAVEL, GLOSADEFINITIVA, DATASINC,
	 UNIDADENEGOCIO, IP, VERSAO, IP1, VERSAO1, RSGLOSA, TECNICA,
	 GRAUPARTICIPACAO, HORAFINAL, PACOTE, DATAGLOSA, USERGLOSA, CUSTO,
	 A_SITUACAO, JUSTIFICATIVA
   FROM x_INTER3
   WHERE INTER3NO = OLD.INTER3NO;
end
 ^

CREATE TRIGGER "DEL_X2_INTER32" FOR "X_INTER32" 
ACTIVE BEFORE DELETE POSITION 0
as
BEGIN
insert into INTER32
  (CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, A_DATA, A_HORA, CODIGOMM, QUANTIDADE,
   VALOR, CODIGO, GLOSA, USER1, USER2, DATA1,
   DATA2, REPRESENTA, GLOSARECEBIDA, GLOSADATA, GLOSATIPO, A_MEDICOS, CUSTO, GLOSARESPONSAVEL,
   GLOSADEFINITIVA, DATASINC, UNIDADENEGOCIO, COBRAR, IP, VERSAO1,
   RSGLOSA, BRASINDICE, SAIDA, PACOTE, DATAGLOSA,USERGLOSA, REAPRESENTATISS,JUSTIFICATIVA )
SELECT
   CODIGOINT, TRATAMENTO, A_DATA, A_HORA, CODIGOMM, QUANTIDADE,
   VALOR, CODIGO, GLOSA, USER1, USER2, DATA1,
   DATA2, REPRESENTA, GLOSARECEBIDA, GLOSADATA, GLOSATIPO, A_MEDICOS, CUSTO, GLOSARESPONSAVEL,
   GLOSADEFINITIVA, DATASINC, UNIDADENEGOCIO, COBRAR, IP, VERSAO1, RSGLOSA, BRASINDICE, SAIDA,
   PACOTE, DATAGLOSA,USERGLOSA, REAPRESENTATISS,JUSTIFICATIVA
FROM X_INTER32
WHERE INTER3NO = OLD.INTER3NO;
END
 ^
